CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libpng12-dev libjpeg-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* 	&& docker-php-ext-configure gd --with-png-dir=/usr --with-jpeg-dir=/usr 	&& docker-php-ext-install gd mysqli opcache
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: { 		echo 'opcache.memory_consumption=128'; 		echo 'opcache.interned_strings_buffer=8'; 		echo 'opcache.max_accelerated_files=4000'; 		echo 'opcache.revalidate_freq=2'; 		echo 'opcache.fast_shutdown=1'; 		echo 'opcache.enable_cli=1'; 	} > /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/opcache-recommended.ini
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -x 	&& curl -o wordpress.tar.gz -fSL "https://wordpress.org/wordpress-${WORDPRESS_VERSION}.tar.gz" 	&& echo "$WORDPRESS_SHA1 *wordpress.tar.gz" | sha1sum -c - 	&& tar -xzf wordpress.tar.gz -C /usr/src/ 	&& rm wordpress.tar.gz 	&& chown -R www-data:www-data /usr/src/wordpress
Commands.Name: run
